title: Attempting To Recconect Half the Game
body:
I had no internet connection problem, this bard game was going fine, just as me and my ad are about to kill a turret, "attempting to reconnect", I can't move and I die to the enemy. I resawpn after that ending, same thing happens, over and over. I try quitting league the reconnecting, at first I get "unable to connect please check your internet connection and try again" even though my internet was perfectly fine. Eventually I reconnected but the same thing kept repeating, I couldn't do anything. Finally it stopped after ages of this and at that point, my team surrendered. What is this problem, why is it happening? Am I just really unlucky or is there something wrong with my perfectly fine internet connection? 
Cheers.
